name: The Square Lair
description:
You are standing in the north-east part of the lair.
You see a sign on the wall.

exits.keywords: door wooden~ 1 -1 7321 D2 Another part of the lair.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign says 'Gods of War I call you, my sword is by my side,
               I seek a light free from all false pride'
                       Reyemle Grug...
